body: I feel bad for the other guy but i heard she broke off with him properly

So this has Chad Ziodyne himself become a priest ntr some adventurer only to get ntrd by some rando ugly bastard. 

At least he wins in the end
Ugh, fking NTR. It would be so adorable and good if that wasnt a thing :(

So for anyone curious about the conversation the protag has at the end of the story, he's seen holding the rosario and questioned about it. He says was given to a girl he used to be in love with, but various things happened and they broke up. He gets asked if he's still hung up on her, but he says no, it was a story from long ago, and she probably doesn't even remember him anymore, but it's fine that way. It ends with an internal monologue saying "Charlotte, you might not be by my side anymore, but I'll keep protecting the world you live in."

So, in some respects he's moved on from her, but in others not really.
I dont find this like ntr its more like a good breakup, the two part are moving foward and dont stuck in the past relashionship like most a the other ntr where the beta MC is obsesed with the girl
This manga is not very Christian to say. :V

oho seems like the guy moved on from her, and judging from his dialogue in those extra 3 pages, he didnt break down into a wreck but instead became stronger. I do hope he find a girl he truly deserves. His expression in page 88 just shows he's not going to be a beta, heck he might even save the world while his previous "girlfriend" will be a fucktoy

Why does it have to be NTR ? It would be perfect if it wasn’t NTR. Nice Art, good angles, and scenes. It’d be nice to remove the old guy too, but at least removing the NTR would make this 10x better, Damn shame.
